body.name: Vinchef Nonstick Frying Pan Anti Scratch,9.5 Inch Skillet Cast Aluminum Cookware, Induction Compatible

features: Frying Pan with Anti-Scratch Technical - Anti-Scratch Technical imported from Germany and turely Non-Stick coating. The slippery, nonstick surface and no rivets design make the frying pan easy to clean in seconds with a towel, soap and warm water. You can use metal utensil,wooden or silicone ones. Recommend Hand Washing to extend the life of pans.

High Quality Skillet Pan - Our sauce pan with Aluminum Die Casting process, well made quality,heavy duty, PFOA/PTFE free and non toxic. With thoughtful design of two pour sprout can bring convenience for your either hand. The bakelite handle features wood grain design, it is comfortable to grip and stays cool while cooking.

Induction Bottom - The nonstick skillet bottom is flat and thick, which helps distribute heat evenly and quickly. The induction bottom of the skillet is suitable for all types of cooking，including electric and ceramic cook tops Gas stove,glass top and induction compatible. Recommended for daily use,indoor,outdoor as well as camping.

Great Pan for Most - Vinchef frying pans can fit you and your family’s varying cooking needs. Ideal gift for friends and relatives who likes to cook. Making great sense for important days, such as congratulations on house-moving, birthday gift,Christmas present etc.

Customer Service and Guarantee - All the pans are shipped after strict quality control.In case of any problems caused by transportation,please contact us timely,we will send you replacement proptly. If you meet any questions during the usage, please reach us anytime.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose VINCHEF cookware？ VINCHEF is a professional manufacture that concerned with design, development and production of cookware. All of our frying pan comply with international quality standards.VINCHEF is doing everything to offer our customers with best service and best kitchen cookware. WE promise that we’ll be responsible all the way to the end once our service begin.This nonstick frying pan with Anti-scratch technology, the nonstick coating will not come off and the outer layer for durability. It’s nonstick surface and no rivets design make the frying pan easy to clean in seconds with a towel, soap.

Vestatile Skillets This nonstick pan is very versatile. It can be used for stir-frying, steaming, boiling, frying and deep-frying, and is an indispensable cookware for your home kitchen. Whether you're making a family favorite or trying new recipes, our deep frying pan can do it all. This frying pan is perfect for family meals or entertaining guests. Stay Cool Handle The pan’s versatile deep shape, light weight, and stylish ergonomic handle make this pan for cooking ideal for everyday use. A temperature sensor at the joint between the handle and the body of the pan helps you to recognize the approximate change in temperature of the pan. Nonstick Frying Pan for Healthy Cooking This perfect nonstick frying pan is suitable for a wide range of applications and can be easily handled by home cooks. Vinchef frying pan is designed for professional multiple cooking use, pans for cooking, egg pan, cooking pan, omelet pan, sauté pan, egg skillet, induction pan. This nonstick frying pan is ideal for healthy cooking, less oil use for healthy diet.

USE & CARE Non-stick frying pan is one of the essential cookware in your kitchen, the correct use of nonstick frying pan can not only make our healthy diet more convenient, but also to extend the life of non-stick cookware.Before using the non-stick frying pan, you can wash it with warm water and then dry it with kitchen paper towel or clean cloth.You can use it to cook soups, sauté vegetables, sear steaks and bake in the ovenDuring the cooking process, you need to control the fire, do not let the food overcooked; stir-frying is best with a wooden spatula or plastic spatula, to avoid the use of steel wire ball and other metal utensils to scrape.When storing pots and pans, try to store them in a dry place, such as a cabinet.

VINCHEF Deep Frying Pan -Great Chioce as a great gift! It is a must-have cookware for the kitchen, and it is also a good gift, which can be a birthday gift, a wedding gift, a home decoration gift, and it is also a perfect choice for Christmas. Whether it's for a beginner or a master chef, it's an ideal gift.The bottom of this non stick frying pan adopts an integrated die cast anti protrusion design that locks the oil in the center of the pan, preventing dry burning. This non-stick pan is pans for cooking with less oil needed and less smoke released. This nonstick frying pan is ideal for healthy cooking, less oil use for healthy diet.Our deep fryer pot uses advanced cast aluminum technology, with the advantages of cast iron and traditional riveted cookware, the frying pan is evenly distributed with 198 heating points, and the pan has a design to prevent heat dissipation, which makes the pan conduct heat quickly and evenly. Suitable for all stovetops, including Induction cooktop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have not owned a non stick pan before and this one is an eye opener. The handle is wood and there are no screws to clean around. Nothing sticks and so far everything cooked in this pan has been perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vinchef Nonstick Frying Pan is great!
reviews.reviewText: Vinchef Nonstick frying aluminum pan with stoneware non-toxic coating has been fantastic to cook with, Even heating and truly is non-stick. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this pan
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite pans. Its non stick, sears and frys food perfectly and cleans up easy. So worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Scratch free and works well on Induction stove top
reviews.reviewText: A good quality nonstick pan that is scratch free and heats quickly on induction to top. Quite easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Also great for making a grilled cheese sandwich
reviews.reviewText: I live in a Class C RV so keeping appliances to a minimum due to space is important to me. I like this frying pan because I'm able to use a toaster bag and put a slice of cheese in between two slices of bread and make me a delicious grilled cheese sandwich. Of course it's good for basic frying as well. I also like the fact that you can use metal utensils if desired. The cooking finish is similar to using a cast iron skillet. The only difference is it doesn't rust and it's easy to clean.I don't know how it would do in a dishwasher. I wash mine by hand and let it air dry, and I've had no problems with it whatsoever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy Duty Pan
reviews.reviewText: This pan is awesome. Nothing sticks to it, it is easy to clean, and looks like it will hold up for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Trashed a $$ ceramic pan less than a year of use. Bought this pan as I thought it was less expensive than the pricey brands.Fabulous pan. Handle is solid and does not transfer heat. Pan cooks very well and clean up is a snap.No oils or butter needed. Love it.3 weeks into using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a great product
reviews.reviewText: I love this product it does what it says on the box it's excellent non-stick is great for bacon
